segments.text: From my angle, I can see the boy's determination as he stretches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand barely reaches over the edge, and I feel a surge of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look safe at all, and I can't help but think he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so focused, yet completely unaware of the risks involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing below him looks so hopeful, almost innocent in her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is or if she just wants a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire their little teamwork, even if it’s misguided.
segments.speaker: PAR
